__e: Crashing is the second best part.
Accident is only the will of the universe expressing itself
"There have been two accidents in my life-
We haven't had an incident at this school in over ten years.
Two crashes in 1 58 years, that's not bad.
Your husband had 2 car accidents in the last 3 months, Detective sergeant.
You know what the biggest reason is that people get into car accidents?
Okay, but there are 750 car accidents every day in this city-- it's more likely...
Now, if I hear of any more incidents on this campus,
I like to know who the good guys are when I come into town, so I don't get into any more friendly fire incidents.
And as far as Vincent goes, if you don't believe me, you mention these incidents I told you about. Ask him yourself.
Well, you just see the crashes and then...
You've had several other accidents... never has there been any data loss.
And that ady from the driving school.
I came out here to tell you accidents happen, and I don't want you to hurt yourself with a statement that's not accurate.
I don't know. Things go wrong every day.
Well, I mean, accidents do happen, but you know that all too well, now, don't you, Professor?
